document.full_text: vera zvonareva and svetlana kuznetsova put russia within reach of their first fed cup final in three years with contrasting victories on saturday.
document.title: zvonareva and kuznetsova give russia 2-0 lead over italy
lines_and_colors: vera zvonareva and svetlana kuznetsova put russia within reach of their first fed cup final in three years with contrasting victories on saturday.
